abstract: House passes bill to repeal Affordable Care Act for first time in new Republican-held chamber; House Democrats note it is 56th time that repeal bill has been passed since 2011; Pres Obama says he will veto bill, but Republicans say vote was necessary to give new House members chance to weigh in on health care law.
lead_paragraph: The latest House bill to repeal the Affordable Care Act was the first one in the new Congress, and gave new Republican members a chance to take a stand.

headline.main: House G.O.P. Again Votes to Repeal Health Care Law
headline.print_headline: House G.O.P. Again Votes to Repeal Health Care Law

snippet: The latest House bill to repeal the Affordable Care Act was the first one in the new Congress, and gave new Republican members a chance to take a stand.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
